abstract: Driven column review of 2016 Honda Pilot Elite.
lead_paragraph: While huge, with an enormous amount of storage, the Pilot is more than 200 pounds lighter than the outgoing model.

headline.main: Video Review: Honda Pilot Is Useful Like a Van, but No Longer Square
headline.print_headline: Honda Pilot Is Useful Like a Van, but It’s No Longer Square

snippet: While huge, with an enormous amount of storage, the Pilot is more than 200 pounds lighter than the outgoing model.
